overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "Take It All!" — Twenty-three-year-old Rod not only has a great body, but when a guy desires size, Rod's the man to call. And if he wants rough treatment, too, Rod's happy to oblige. "Taking It Straight" — Tony is a straight kid with a fantastic physique who like to thumb girlie mags and finger himself into throbbing readiness. Fortunately, a hunky pair of his buddies obligingly tease him until he's begging for it! "Stud Me" (a.k.a. "Springtime Lovers," "Carl") — Horny ranch hand Bill (David Price) invites his buddy, Dave, out to the spread with the intentions of plowing the city dude. Instead, Dave upends the randy wrangler and turns him every which way but loose.
title: Stud Me
